name: NPC has a life too!
description:
Ever wondered what the game character sees if the roles were reversed? Aren't you the NPC then?  The player has a life! Truly! 

In the real world you have  "needs" which turn out to be distractions that make you lose focus and then its game over. So let the game character become the player and tend to your needs and distractions for a change. 

My first real attempt at "publishing" a game and successfully submitting in a game-jam.

Hope you have fun ... and chuckle! :-)
